DESCRIPTION: Bad Sectors are cost #b0 #yStatus cards that have #b1 #yImprobability, #yExhaust, and are #ySoulbound.
Dummies are cost #b0 cards that are #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
Gaping creatures take more damage equal to its amount from #yAttacks.
A lasting effect on the run. Higher #yImprobability leads to more #rchaotic and #rsevere consequences.
Cost X card with #yImprobability. Uses Energy to reduce #yImprobability gain, up to the card's #yXprobability.
